location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter from Lieutenant-Colonel Sir Ephraim Gerrish Stannus, Resident in the Persian Gulf to John Wedderburn, Accountant General, Bombay

mods.abstract: Notification that Stannus had furnished Lieutenant George Barnes Brucks commanding HCC (the Honourable Company's Cruiser) Discoverywith various presents for use in the course of his survey of the Persian coast. The letter is followed by the list of presents, dated 15 April 1826.
